meanings.definition: Unable to be erased or forgotten.
meanings.sent1: The memory of her first pet was ineffaceable.
meanings.sent2: The ink stain on his shirt was ineffaceable.
meanings.sent3: The ineffaceable doodle on the whiteboard made the teacher chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness left an ineffaceable mark on everyone she met.
meanings.sent5: The ineffaceable scar on his arm told a story of bravery.

meanings.sent1: The ineffaceable smile on her face brightened the room.
meanings.sent2: The ineffaceable bond between the siblings was heartwarming.
meanings.sent3: His ineffaceable love for ice cream always made his friends smile.
meanings.sent4: The ineffaceable sunset painted the sky in hues of orange and pink.
meanings.sent5: The ineffaceable stars in the night sky twinkled like diamonds.
